title: FT/FS: BVG and PSA Commons - ALL SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: BVG and PSA Commons - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
ALL SOLD.

Getting rid of dupes.....open to trade requests. Prices include shipping via first class with tracking.

SOLD Williams - BVG 3 - discolored along top
SOLD Kruger - SGC 30 - Nice card with a crease along top right
SOLD Willetts - SGC 30 - Nice card with smudge on bottom right of front
SOLD  Stark - BVG 1.5 - crease down the middle
TRADED Konetchy - SGC 40 - very nice, some discoloring on back

Or make me an offer!

Apologies on scans, my scanner doesn't like SGC and BVG cards.....

Bump to remove Stark and Konetchy.

Lowered prices on Kruger and Willetts and also added them on to ebay.

Make me an offer!
